price: Kemudian (Firʻawn ) hendak mengusir mereka (Musa dan pengikut-pengikutnya) dari bumi (Mesir) itu, maka Kami tenggelamkan dia (Firʻawn ) serta orang-orang yang bersama-sama dia seluruhnya,
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
